card.name: Terror Pit
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures.

card.name: Bronze-Arm Tribe
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Aqua Surfer
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Faerie Life
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Skysword, the Savage Vizier
card.text: ■ Multi ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. Then add the top card of your deck to your shields face down.

card.name: Miraculous Snare
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Choose a non-evolution creature in the battle zone and add it to its owner's shields face down.

card.name: Dolgeza, Strong Striker
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Sympathy ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card for each of your Earth Eaters in the battle zone. Then you may draw a card for each of your Giants in the battle zone. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Shaman Totem
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card for each race you have in the battle zone other than Mystery Totem.

card.name: Aku, Ultimate God
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Double Breaker ■ Whenever one of your Gods in the battle zone would be destroyed, you may return it to your hand instead. ■ God Link (tooltip ■ Whenever this creature attacks while linked, you may destroy one of your opponent's creatures.

card.name: Zen, Transcendent God
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Blocker ■ Double Breaker ■ God Link (tooltip ■ While this creature is linked, it has "quattro breaker" and untaps at the End Step

card.name: Crest of Mother
card.text: ■ Choose a civilization. You may put one of your creatures that has the chosen civilization from the battle zone into your mana zone. If you do, choose a creature in your mana zone that has the same civilization as the chosen creature that costs the same as or less than than the number of cards in your mana zone and put it into the battle zone.

card.name: Earth Eternity Gate
card.text: ■ Put a God that costs 7 or less from your graveyard or mana zone into the battle zone.

card.name: Violence Heaven (card)
card.text: ■ This spell costs up to 3 less to summon for each of your linked Gods in the battle zone. It can't cost less than 1. ■ Destroy all creatures except Gods.

card.name: Grave Deal, Shadow of Pure Flame
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. If you have a God in your mana zone, that creature gets -4000 power until the End Step

card.name: Amaterasu, Founder of the Blue Wolves
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of the following. :► Search your deck. Choose a spell that costs 4 or less from it and shuffle your deck. Then cast that spell for no cost. :► Search your deck. Choose a cross gear that costs 4 or less from it and shuffle your deck. Then generate that cross gear for no cost.

card.name: Chief De Baula, Machine King of Mystic Light
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may return a spell from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Space Crawler
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, for each civilization in your mana zone, you may look at a card from the top of your deck. Put one of them into your hand, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: Cyber Brain
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Draw up to 3 cards.
